login.title: Ngena ngemvume ukuze uqhubeke

toasts.ssoNotConfigured: I-SSO yebhizinisi ayilungiselelwe lesi sizinda. Sicela uxhumane nomphathi wakho we-IT noma usebenzise enye indlela yokungena ngemvume.

login.ssoDescription: Kwezinhlangano, amanyuvesi, kanye nezikole ezisebenzisa i-SSO
login.enterWorkEmail: Faka i-imeyili yakho yasemsebenzini noma yesikole
login.enterWorkEmailDescription: Faka ikheli lakho le-imeyili lasemsebenzini noma lasesikoleni. Sizokuqondisa ngokuzenzakalelayo ekhasini lokungena lenhlangano yakho.
login.ssoProvidersInfo: Isebenza ne-Microsoft Azure AD, i-Okta, i-Google Workspace, kanye nabanye abahlinzeki bomazisi abasetshenziswa yizinkampani, amanyuvesi kanye nezikole.
login.oneAccountForAll: I-akhawunti eyodwa yokuhlaziywa kokuqukethwe, ukuhlela, nokuningi.

forgotPassword.title: Ukhohlwe iphasiwedi
forgotPassword.subtitle: Faka i-imeyili yakho ukuze usethe kabusha iphasiwedi yakho

toasts.checkEmail: Hlola i-imeyili yakho ukuze uthole isixhumanisi sokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi

toasts.loginNow: Manje usungakwazi ukungena ngemvume ngephasiwedi yakho entsha

gdpr.consentDataProcessing: Ngiyavuma ukuthi idatha yami yomuntu siqu icutshungulwe ukuze kuphathwe i-akhawunti futhi kuhlinzekwe izinsizakalo
gdpr.marketingConsent: Ngifuna ukuthola izibuyekezo zomkhiqizo kanye nokuxhumana kokumaketha (ongakukhetha)

dashboard.clickToViewPosts: Chofoza amaphuzu edatha ukuze ubuke okuthunyelwe
dashboard.clickToViewDetails: Chofoza imigoqo ukuze ubuke ukuhlaziya okuningiliziwe
dashboard.clickRowToView: Chofoza noma yimuphi umugqa ukuze ubuke imininingwane yokuthunyelwe

dashboard.noBottomPosts: Akukho okuthunyelwe okuhlaziyiwe okwamanje. Dala okuthunyelwe kwakho kokuqala!

contentGeneration.title: Ukukhiqizwa Kokuqukethwe kwe-AI
contentGeneration.subtitle: Khiqiza okuqukethwe ngokushesha, hlela ukwenziwa okuzenzakalelayo, noma ubuke umlando wakho.
contentGeneration.tip: Icebiso: Buyekeza futhi wenze ngezifiso okuqukethwe okukhiqizwe ukuze kufane nezwi lomkhiqizo wakho. Ungakuhlela kabanzi ku-Content Moderation.
contentGeneration.promptDesc: Chaza ukuthi yikuphi okuqukethwe ofuna kukhiqizwe ngokuzenzakalelayo...
contentGeneration.promotionalDisclosure: Ukudalulwa kuzongezwa ukuze kuhambisane neziqondiso zokukhangisa
contentGeneration.noScheduled: Azikho izixwayiso ezihleliwe okwamanje. Dala esinye ngenhla!
contentGeneration.noHistory: Akukho okuqukethwe okukhiqiziwe okwamanje. Qala ukudala!

suggestions.insights: Thumela mayelana nokuqonda noma izitayela zomkhakha

errors.generationFailed: Ukukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe kwehlulekile. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.selectPlatformAutoPost: Sicela ukhethe okungenani ipulatifomu eyodwa yokuthumela ngokuzenzakalelayo

contentGeneration.selectPlatformsOptimize: Khetha amapulatifomu okuthuthukisa ukuhlaziywa kokuqukethwe nokuphoqelela imikhawulo yabalingiswa

contentModeration.title: Ubuhlakani Bokuqukethwe
contentModeration.contentPlaceholder: Faka okuqukethwe kwakho kokuthunyelwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapha...
contentModeration.promotionalDisclosure: Ukudalulwa kuzongezwa ukuze kuhambisane neziqondiso zokukhangisa
contentModeration.editingPostDesc: Uma ulondoloza, lokhu kuzobuyekeza okuthunyelwe komlando - hhayi ukudala okusha
contentModeration.originalReplaced: Okuqukethwe kokuqala kuthathelwe indawo yinguqulo ebhalwe kabusha
contentModeration.clearConfirm: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukusula lokhu okuqukethwe ngaphandle kokulondoloza?
contentModeration.createYourFirst: Dala okuthunyelwe kwakho kokuqala ukuze ukubone lapha

posts.title: Konke Okuthunyelwe
posts.subtitle: Phatha okuqukethwe kwakho kuwo wonke amapulatifomu

strategicProfiles.pageDescription: Dala amaphrofayili omkhiqizo anezisekelo zolwazi bese uwaxhumanisa nama-akhawunti omphakathi
strategicProfiles.alertDescription: Iphrofayela ngayinye iqukethe ulwazi oluhlukile, isitayela sokubhala, kanye namagama angukhiye e-SEO. Layisha amadokhumenti ukuze wakhe isisekelo solwazi esiqondisa ukukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe kwe-AI. Xhumanisa ama-akhawunti omphakathi ukuze ushicilele ngqo kusuka kumongo ngamunye wephrofayela.
strategicProfiles.defaultProfileDesc: Iphrofayela yakho eyinhloko ixhunywe kuzilungiselelo ze-akhawunti
strategicProfiles.contentLanguageHelper: Ulimi lokuqukethwe okukhiqizwe yi-AI (okungenalutho = ukusetshenziswa okuzenzakalelayo kusuka kuzilungiselelo)
strategicProfiles.seoKeywordsHelper: Engeza amagama angukhiye ukuze ulungiselele okuqukethwe kokusesha
strategicProfiles.supportedFormats: Kusekelwa: i-PDF, i-Word, i-Excel, i-PowerPoint, umbhalo, i-Markdown, i-CSV
strategicProfiles.profileNamePlaceholder: isib., Umkhiqizo Wokumaketha, Ibhulogi Yobuchwepheshe, Okomuntu Siqu

bonusMetadata.title: Izilungiselelo Zephrofayela Ezithuthukisiwe
bonusMetadata.targetAudiencePlaceholder: Chaza izithameli zakho oziqondisile (isib. ochwepheshe bokumaketha abaneminyaka engu-25-45 abanentshisekelo kwezobuchwepheshe)
bonusMetadata.targetAudienceHelper: Isiza i-AI ukuthi ihlele ithoni nokuqukethwe kwezithameli zakho ezithile

strategicProfiles.noSocialAccounts: Awekho ama-akhawunti omphakathi atholakele. Xhuma ama-akhawunti ku-

toasts.addedKeywords: Kungezwe amagama angukhiye asekelwe kuphrofayela yakho

strategicProfiles.confirmDeleteProfile: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le phrofayela? Lokhu kuzosusa nawo wonke amadokhumenti asekelwe kolwazi alayishiwe.
strategicProfiles.confirmDeleteDoc: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le dokhumenti?

aiKnowledgeExtractor.title: Isikhiphi Solwazi lwe-AI
aiKnowledgeExtractor.dropHint: Lahla umhlahlandlela womkhiqizo, ilogo, noma idokhumenti yenqubomgomo

reviewModal.summaryHint: Lesi sifinyezo sizofakwa kusisekelo solwazi sephrofayela yakho.

toasts.invalidFileTypeDesc: Sicela ulayishe ifayela le-PDF, i-DOCX, i-TXT, i-MD, i-PNG, i-JPG, noma i-WEBP.

settings.title: Izilungiselelo
settings.languageHelp: Khetha ulimi oluthandayo lwesixhumi esibonakalayo kanye nolimi lokuqukethwe oluzenzakalelayo
settings.defaultHomepageHelp: Leli khasi lizovuleka uma ungena ngemvume

teamPage.subtitle: Phatha amalungu eqembu lakho kanye nezimvume zawo
teamPage.inviteFirst: Mema ilungu leqembu lakho lokuqala ukuthi liqale

inviteModal.title: Mema Ilungu Leqembu
inviteModal.messagePlaceholder: Engeza inothi lomuntu siqu esimemweni sakho...

roles.creator: Umdali
roles.creatorDesc: Ungadala futhi uhlele okuqukethwe, ukuthumele ukuze kuvunywe
roles.adminOption: Umphathi - Ukufinyelela okugcwele okuhlanganisa nokuphathwa kwethimba

toasts.emailRequiredDesc: Sicela ufake ikheli le-imeyili lelungu leqembu.

teamPage.confirmRemove: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa u-{{name}} eqenjini?

roles.title: Ukuphathwa Kwendima
roles.subtitle: Dala futhi uphathe izindima ezenziwe ngokwezifiso ngezimvume ezihlanganisiwe
roles.noRoles: Azikho izindima ezenziwe ngokwezifiso okwamanje. Dala eyodwa ukuze uqalise.

createModal.title: Dala Indima Entsha
createModal.permissionsHint: Khetha izimvume okufanele zibe nazo le ndima. Izimvume ezinobungozi obukhulu ziyagqanyiswa.

deleteConfirm.title: Susa Indima
deleteConfirm.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa indima ethi "{{name}}"?
deleteConfirm.warning: Abasebenzisi abangu-{{count}} okwamanje banale ndima. Bazolahlekelwa yizo zonke izimvume ezihlobene nale ndima.

featureDisabled.title: Isici Asivunyelwe
featureDisabled.message: Izimvume ze-granular azikanikwa amandla ebhizinisini lakho. Xhumana nomphathi wakho ukuze unike amandla lesi sici.

settings.universalDocsDescription: Lena imithetho yakho yokuthobela imithetho (Izinga 2). Le mihlahlandlela isebenza KUYO YONKE okuqukethwe okukhiqizayo, kokubili okomuntu siqu kanye nenkampani. Layisha izintandokazi zakho, imikhawulo, kanye nemithetho yesitayela lapha.
settings.personalComplianceInfo: Le mithetho ihlolwe KUWO WONKE amaphrofayela akho. Ukuze uthole imithetho ethile yenkampani, iya kuzilungiselelo zebhizinisi.
settings.reportsDescription: Landa imibiko ephelele yokuhlola ubungozi kanye nokuhlaziywa kokuqukethwe
settings.pdfReportDescription: Kufaka phakathi ukuhlolwa kwengozi, ukuhlaziywa kokuthobela imithetho, ukuqonda ukuzwela kwamasiko, kanye nokuhlaziywa kokuqukethwe okusekelwe ku-LLM
settings.profileOverview: Ukubuka Konke Kwephrofayela kanye Nendlela Yokwenza
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Susa unomphela i-akhawunti yakho kanye nayo yonke idatha ehlobene nayo
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Uma usususile i-akhawunti yakho, akukho ukubuyela emuva. Yonke idatha yakho okuhlanganisa okuthunyelwe, ukuhlaziywa, okuqukethwe okuhleliwe, kanye nezilungiselelo kuzosuswa unomphela.
settings.noHistoryFound: Akukho mlando otholiwe. Qala ukuhlaziya okuqukethwe ukuze ubone umsebenzi wakho lapha.
settings.purchaseCreditsDesc: Thenga amakhredithi engeziwe noma uthuthukise okubhalisele kwakho ukuze uthole amakhredithi engeziwe enyanga zonke.
settings.choosePlanDesc: Khetha uhlelo olufanela izidingo zakho. Amakhredithi angasetshenziswanga azoqhubeka kuze kube yinyanga ezayo!
settings.extraCreditsDesc: Thenga amaphakethe esikweletu engeziwe noma nini. Lawa makhredithi awaphelelwa yisikhathi futhi aqhubeka njalo ngenyanga!
settings.creditsAddedInstantly: Amakhredithi engezwa ngokushesha futhi awaphelelwa yisikhathi. Aqhubekela enyangeni ezayo!

enterprise.title: Ideshibhodi Yebhizinisi
enterprise.creator: Umdali
enterprise.createCompanyDesc: Dala inkampani ukuze uvule izici zeqembu, izisekelo zolwazi ezabiwe, kanye nemisebenzi yokubambisana yokuqukethwe.
enterprise.onlyAdminsCanManage: Abaphathi Benkampani kuphela abangaphatha isisekelo solwazi lwenkampani kanye nezilungiselelo zeqembu. Xhumana nomphathi wakho ukuze uthole izinguquko.
enterprise.createAsAdminNote: Njengomdali, uzoba uMphathi weNkampani onezimvume ezigcwele zokuphatha ithimba kanye nolwazi.
enterprise.knowledgeBaseDesc: Amadokhumenti alayishwe lapha asebenza kuwo wonke amalungu eqembu kukho konke okuqukethwe kwawo. Le mithetho ibaluleke kakhulu futhi idlula izilungiselelo zomsebenzisi ngamunye kanye nephrofayela.
enterprise.uploadCompanyDocsHint: Iziqondiso zomkhiqizo, izinqubomgomo zomthetho, imibhalo yokuthobela imithetho, izinqubomgomo zezokuxhumana
enterprise.noCompanyDocs: Azikho izincwadi zenkampani ezilayishiwe okwamanje. Qala ngokulayisha izinkombandlela zomkhiqizo wakho noma imibhalo yokuthobela imithetho.
enterprise.teamMembersDesc: Phatha amalungu eqembu lakho kanye nezindima zawo. Abaphathi bangalayisha amadokhumenti enkampani futhi baphathe iqembu.
enterprise.leaveCompanyWarning: Shiya le nkampani. Uma unguwe wedwa umphathi, kufanele ukhuthaze elinye ilungu kuqala.
enterprise.loseAccessWarning: Uzolahlekelwa ukufinyelela kolwazi oluhlanganyelwe lwenkampani kanye nezici zeqembu.
enterprise.adminLeaveWarning: Njengomphathi, kufanele unyuse elinye ilungu libe umphathi ngaphambi kokuhamba.
enterprise.enterEmailAddress: Sicela ufake ikheli le-imeyili lomuntu ofuna ukummema.
enterprise.addPersonalNote: Engeza inothi lomuntu siqu esimemweni sakho...

dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yebhizinisi
dashboard.scoreDescriptions: Ngokusekelwe kumaphuzu okuhlaziywa kwe-AI: Okuhle kakhulu (85-100), Okuhle (75-84), Okumaphakathi (60-74), Okubi (40-59), Okubalulekile (0-39)
dashboard.accessDeniedDesc: Abaphathi bebhizinisi kuphela abangafinyelela kuleli khasi

analytics.pageDescription: Ukuqonda okuphelele kwepulatifomu kanye nezilinganiso (Ukuphatha Kuphela)
analytics.scoreTrendsDesc: Sekukonke, ukuthambekela kwamaphuzu okuthobela imithetho kanye namasiko (izinyanga eziyi-6)
analytics.geographicDistributionDesc: Chofoza kumaka ukuze ubone ukwahlukaniswa kwenani labantu ngezwe
analytics.costAnalysisDesc: Izindleko zokucubungula i-AI kanye nokulandelela isabelomali

cancel.title: Khansela Okubhaliselwe
cancel.subtitle: Siyaxolisa ukukubona uhamba
cancel.confirmCancel: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukukhansela okubhalisele kwakho?
cancel.keepBenefits: Uzogcina ukufinyelela kuze kube sekupheleni kwesikhathi sakho sokukhokha

errors.networkError: Iphutha lenethiwekhi. Sicela uhlole uxhumano lwakho.
errors.validationError: Sicela uhlole okufakayo bese uzama futhi

scheduledPosts.pendingApprovalDesc: Okuthunyelwe okuthunyelwe ngamalungu eqembu kulinde isibuyekezo sakho.
scheduledPosts.approvedReadyDesc: Okuthunyelwe okuvunyiwe kulungele ukuhleleka noma ukushicilelwa.
scheduledPosts.scheduledPostsDesc: Okuthunyelwe kulungele ukushicilelwa ngesikhathi sako esihleliwe.
scheduledPosts.autoPostToSocial: Thumela ngokuzenzakalela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngemva kwesizukulwane
scheduledPosts.rejectionPlaceholder: Sicela unikeze impendulo eyakhayo echaza ukuthi kungani lokhu okuthunyelwe kudinga ukubuyekezwa...
scheduledPosts.rejectionFeedbackNote: Le mpendulo izothunyelwa kumdali ukuze imsize athuthukise okuthunyelwe.

toasts.postReturnedDesc: Okuthunyelwe kuthunyelwe emuva kumdali kanye nempendulo yakho.

scheduledPosts.confirmCancel: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukukhansela lokhu okuthunyelwe okuhleliwe?
scheduledPosts.confirmDeletePrompt: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lesi sicelo esihleliwe?

allPosts.importTooltip: Ngenisa okuthunyelwe komlando kusuka kuma-akhawunti akho omphakathi axhunyiwe nge-Ayrshare
allPosts.connectSocialToView: Xhuma ama-akhawunti omphakathi kuzilungiselelo ukuze ubuke
allPosts.createFirstPost: Dala okuthunyelwe kwakho kokuqala kuthebhu Yokukhiqiza Okuqukethwe!

toasts.connectSocialAccountsDesc: Xhuma ama-akhawunti akho ezinkundla zokuxhumana kuzilungiselelo ukuze uvumelanise amamethrikhi okuzibandakanya.
toasts.connectSocialFirst: Sicela uxhume ama-akhawunti akho omphakathi kuqala kuzilungiselelo > Ama-akhawunti Omphakathi
toasts.ayrshareUpgradeRequired: Kudingeka i-Ayrshare Premium noma Uhlelo Lwebhizinisi

allPosts.confirmReanalyze: Lokhu kuzohlaziya kabusha konke okuthunyelwe kwakho. Qhubeka?
allPosts.confirmDelete: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lokhu okuthunyelwe?

documentation.title: Usizo kanye Nemibhalo
documentation.subtitle: Thola iziqondiso nezinsiza ezizokusiza ukuthi uthole okuningi ku-Contentry. Khetha umhlahlandlela ngokusekelwe endimeni yakho.

whatsNew.title: Yini entsha
whatsNew.description: Kutholwe ngokuzenzakalelayo izibuyekezo nezici ezintsha ezingezwe epulatifomu
whatsNew.subtitle: Kutholwe ngokuzenzakalelayo izinguquko kanye nezibuyekezo zepulatifomu

adminGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Wokuphatha
adminGuide.description: Umhlahlandlela ophelele wabaphathi beplatifomu. Funda ukuthi ungaphatha kanjani abasebenzisi, uqaphe ukuhlaziya, futhi ulungiselele izilungiselelo zesistimu.

enterpriseGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Webhizinisi
enterpriseGuide.description: Umhlahlandlela wabaphathi benkampani. Funda ukuphatha ithimba lakho, usethe izisekelo zolwazi, futhi uphathe ukuvunyelwa kokuqukethwe.

userGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Womsebenzisi
userGuide.description: Konke okudingayo ukuze udale, uhlaziye, futhi ushicilele okuqukethwe. Kuphelele kubadali bokuqukethwe kanye nabathengisi.

overview.intro: Njengomphathi weplatifomu, unokufinyelela kumathuluzi aphelele okuqapha nokuphatha yonke iplatifomu yokuqukethwe. Lo mhlahlandlela uzokusiza uqonde amakhono akho okuphatha.
overview.dashboardDesc: Ideshibhodi Yokuphatha inikeza umbono wentokozo womsebenzi wepulatifomu kanye nempilo.
overview.tip: Vakashela i-Admin Dashboard njalo ukuze uhlale unolwazi mayelana nezitayela zepulatifomu futhi uthole izinkinga ezingaba khona kusenesikhathi.

userManagement.intro: Ukuphathwa komsebenzisi kuwumsebenzi oyinhloko wokuphatha okuvumela ukuthi uqondise bonke abasebenzisi namabhizinisi epulatifomu.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Finyelela isigaba Sokuphathwa Kwabasebenzisi ukuze ubuke, useshe, futhi uphathe bonke abasebenzisi beplatifomu.
userManagement.feature1: Sesha futhi uhlunge abasebenzisi ngegama, i-imeyili, noma indima
userManagement.feature2: Buka amaphrofayela abasebenzisi anemininingwane kanye nomlando womsebenzi
userManagement.feature4: Vala noma susa ama-akhawunti abasebenzisi uma kudingeka
userManagement.role1: Umphathi: Ukufinyelela okugcwele kwepulatifomu ngamakhono okucushwa kwesistimu
userManagement.role2: Umphathi Webhizinisi: Uphatha ithimba lenkampani yakhe kanye nezilungiselelo
userManagement.role3: Umsebenzisi: Izici ezijwayelekile zokudala nokuhlaziya okuqukethwe
userManagement.warning: Qinisekisa njalo umthelela ngaphambi kokushintsha izindima zomsebenzisi noma ukususa ama-akhawunti. Lezi zenzo zingase zithinte ukusebenza kweqembu.

analytics.intro: I-Analytics inikeza ukuqonda okujulile ngendlela ipulatifomu esetshenziswa ngayo kuwo wonke amabhizinisi nabasebenzisi.
analytics.metric1: Abasebenzisi abasebenzayo abaphelele kanye nemikhuba yokukhula
analytics.metric5: Ukuthobela imithetho kanye nezilinganiso zengozi kuwo wonke amabhizinisi
analytics.tip: Thumela imibiko yokuhlaziya ukuze uthole izethulo zababambiqhaza usebenzisa isici sokulanda umbiko.

financials.intro: Isigaba Sokubuka Konke Kwezezimali sinikeza ukubonakala kwezibalo zemali engenayo yepulatifomu kanye nokubhaliselwe.
financials.revenueDesc: Gada impilo yezezimali kanye nemikhuba yokubhalisa kuwo wonke amabhizinisi.
financials.feature1: Ukulandelela imali engenayo ephindaphindayo yanyanga zonke (i-MRR)

systemConfig.intro: Ukucushwa kwesistimu kukuvumela ukuthi uphathe izilungiselelo kanye nokuhlanganiswa kwepulatifomu yonke.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Lungiselela futhi uqaphe ukuhlanganiswa kwezinkampani zangaphandle:
systemConfig.tip: Hlola njalo ukuhlanganiswa endaweni yokubeka izigaba ngaphambi kokwenza izinguquko kuzilungiselelo zokukhiqiza.

gettingStarted.intro: Siyakwamukela ku-Contentry! NjengoMqondisi Webhizinisi, unamathuluzi okuphatha ithimba lakho, ukusungula iziqondiso zokuqukethwe, nokuqinisekisa ukuhambisana komkhiqizo.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Landela lezi zinyathelo ukuze usethe i-akhawunti yakho yebhizinisi:
gettingStarted.step1: Zulazulela kuzilungiselelo > Ibhizinisi ukuze ufinyelele ideshibhodi yenkampani yakho
gettingStarted.step2: Layisha iziqondiso nezinqubomgomo zomkhiqizo wenkampani yakho ku-Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Mema amalungu eqembu lakho bese unikeza imisebenzi efanele
gettingStarted.step4: Lungiselela ukugeleza komsebenzi kokugunyazwa kokubuyekezwa kokuqukethwe
gettingStarted.tip: Qedela ukusetha kwakho i-Knowledge Base ngaphambi kokumema amalungu eqembu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi afinyelela iziqondiso zomkhiqizo kusukela ngosuku lokuqala.

teamManagement.intro: Ukuphathwa kwethimba okuphumelelayo kuqinisekisa ukubambisana okubushelelezi kanye nokulawulwa kokufinyelela okufanele enhlanganweni yakho.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Engeza amalungu amasha eqenjini lebhizinisi lakho:
teamManagement.feature2: Khetha indima yabo (Umdali, Umphathi, noma Umphathi)
teamManagement.feature3: Engeza umlayezo womuntu siqu ongawukhetha esimemweni
teamManagement.role1: Umdali: Angadala futhi athumele okuqukethwe ukuze kuvunywe
teamManagement.role2: Umphathi: Angavuma/enqaba okuqukethwe futhi aphathe abadali
teamManagement.role3: Umphathi: Ukufinyelela okugcwele kwebhizinisi okuhlanganisa ukukhokhisa nezilungiselelo
teamManagement.tip: Izimemo ziphelelwa yisikhathi ngemva kwezinsuku eziyi-7. Khumbuza amalungu eqembu ukuthi amukele izimemo zawo ngokushesha.

knowledgeBase.intro: I-Knowledge Base iyinqolobane eyinhloko yenkampani yakho yeziqondiso zomkhiqizo, izinqubomgomo, kanye nemithetho yokuqukethwe. Amadokhumenti alayishwe lapha azisa okuqukethwe okukhiqizwe yi-AI kuwo wonke amalungu eqembu.
knowledgeBase.docType1: Iziqondiso zesitayela somkhiqizo kanye neziqondiso zezwi
knowledgeBase.tip: Layisha iziqondiso zakho zomkhiqizo ezibaluleke kakhulu kuqala. I-AI ibeka phambili amadokhumenti enkampanini i-Knowledge Base kunokulayisha ngabasebenzisi ngabanye.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Uhlelo lokusebenza lokugunyaza luqinisekisa ukuthi konke okuqukethwe kuhlangabezana nezindinganiso zenkampani yakho ngaphambi kokushicilela.
approvalWorkflow.warning: Nika amandla izidingo zokugunyazwa kuzilungiselelo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi konke okuqukethwe kuyabuyekezwa ngaphambi kokushicilela.

billing.intro: Phatha okubhaliselwe kwebhizinisi lakho futhi uqaphe ukusetshenziswa kwekhredithi.
billing.feature1: Imininingwane yohlelo lwamanje kanye nokwabiwa kwesikweletu

adminUsersPage.title: Ukuphathwa Komsebenzisi
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Phatha abasebenzisi beplatifomu yonke
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lo msebenzisi?

deleteModal.title: Susa Umsebenzisi
deleteModal.description: Lokhu kuzosusa unomphela umsebenzisi nayo yonke idatha ehlobene:

gettingStarted.intro: Siyakwamukela ku-Contentry! Lo mhlahlandlela uzokusiza ukuthi udale okuqukethwe okuhehayo nokuhambisanayo usebenzisa amathuluzi asebenzisa i-AI.
gettingStarted.step3: Dala iphrofayela yesu lomkhiqizo noma umkhankaso wakho
gettingStarted.tip: Qala ngephrofayili yamasu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi konke okuqukethwe kwakho kugcina ithoni nemiyalezo efanayo.

contentCreation.intro: Ukukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe okusekelwe ku-AI kwe-Contentry kukusiza ukuthi udale okuthunyelwe okuhehayo ngemizuzwana.
contentCreation.feature1: Faka isihloko noma isixwayiso esichaza lokho ofuna ukuthumela ngakho
contentCreation.feature2: Khetha amapulatifomu akho okuqondiwe (i-LinkedIn, i-Twitter, i-Facebook, njll.)
contentCreation.schedule2: Khetha izinsuku nezikhathi ezithile zokuthumela ngokuzenzakalelayo
contentCreation.schedule3: Nika amandla ukuthumela ngokuzenzakalelayo noma ukubuyekeza ngesandla ngaphambi kokushicilela
contentCreation.tip: Sebenzisa ibhokisi lokuhlola elithi 'Okuqukethwe Kokuphromotha' lapho udala okuthunyelwe kokumaketha ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukuhlaziywa kokuthobela imithetho kucabangela imihlahlandlela yokuphromotha.

analyzeContent.intro: Isici se-Analyse Content sibuyekeza okuqukethwe kwakho ukuze kutholakale ukuthi kuyahambisana yini nomthetho, kuzwela amasiko, kanye nokuhambisana komkhiqizo.
analyzeContent.step4: Chofoza u-Hlaziya ukuze uthole impendulo enemininingwane
analyzeContent.type2: Ukuzwela kwamasiko kuzo zonke izifunda ezahlukene
analyzeContent.tip: Hlaziya njalo okuqukethwe ngaphambi kokushicilela kumapulatifomu angaphandle, ikakhulukazi emikhankasweni eqondiswe ezifundeni eziningi.

strategicProfiles.intro: Amaphrofayili Amaqhinga achaza umongo, ithoni, kanye neziqondiso zokudalwa nokuhlaziywa kokuqukethwe.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Chaza izithameli eziqondiwe zephrofayela kanye nenhloso yayo
strategicProfiles.feature2: Beka izinto ezicatshangelwayo ngamasiko kanye nezifunda
strategicProfiles.feature4: Lungiselela ithoni ezenzakalelayo kanye nezintandokazi zesitayela
strategicProfiles.tip: Dala amaphrofayili ahlukene amaqhinga emikhankaso ehlukene, amabhrendi, noma izimakethe zesifunda.

socialAccounts.intro: Xhuma ama-akhawunti akho ezinkundla zokuxhumana ukuze ushicilele okuqukethwe ngqo kusuka ku-Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: I-LinkedIn - Amakhasi Omuntu Siqu kanye naweNkampani
socialAccounts.warning: Gcina ukuxhumana kwakho kwe-akhawunti yokuxhumana nabantu kusesikhathini. Amathokheni aphelelwe yisikhathi angavimbela okuthunyelwe okuhleliwe ukuthi kungashicilelwa.

approvalProcess.intro: Uma ibhizinisi lakho linikwe amandla okusebenza okugunyaza, okuqukethwe kumele kubuyekezwe ngaphambi kokushicilela.
approvalProcess.step2: Chofoza okuthi 'Thumela ukuze Uvunyelwe' ukuze uthumele kumphathi wakho
approvalProcess.step3: Landelela isimo sokugunyazwa emgqeni wokugunyazwa okulindile
approvalProcess.tip: Engeza amanothi lapho uthumela okuqukethwe ukuze unike ababuyekezi umongo mayelana nezinqumo zakho zokudala.

aboutGuide.title: Mayelana Nemikhuba Emihle Kakhulu
aboutGuide.description: Funda ukuthi okuqukethwe kuyini futhi uthole izindlela ezinhle kakhulu zokuthuthukisa ukudalwa kokuqukethwe kwakho, amadili omkhiqizo, kanye namaphrofayela abantu abanethonya.

whatIsContentry.intro: I-Contentry iyipulatifomu yobuhlakani bokuqukethwe eqhutshwa yi-AI eyenzelwe ukusiza abadali bokuqukethwe, abathengisi, kanye namabhizinisi ukudala, ukuhlaziya, nokushicilela okuqukethwe okuhambisanayo ngezinga. Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ungumthonya oyedwa noma uyingxenye yeqembu elikhulu lokumaketha, i-Contentry yenza kube lula ukuhamba komsebenzi wakho wokuqukethwe.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Sikholelwa ekunikeni abadali amandla ngamathuluzi ahlakaniphile aqinisekisa ukuthi konke okuqukethwe kusekelwe kumkhiqizo, kuzwela amasiko, futhi kuhambisana neziqondiso zepulatifomu.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Ukukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe okusekelwe ku-AI okuhambisana nezwi lomkhiqizo wakho
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Ukuhlolwa kokuthobela imithetho ngesikhathi sangempela kwezimfuneko zomthetho
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Ukuhlaziywa kokuzwela kwamasiko kwezilaleli zomhlaba wonke
whatIsContentry.tip: Ukuqukethwe kuhlanganisa amandla e-AI nokuphathwa komuntu ukuze kulethwe okuqukethwe okuvumelana nezilaleli zakho ngenkathi kugcinwa kuvumelana nezimo.

keyFeatures.intro: I-Contentry inikeza isethi ephelele yamathuluzi okuphatha yonke impilo yakho yokuqukethwe:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Khiqiza okuqukethwe kwekhwalithi ephezulu okwenzelwe umkhiqizo wakho kanye nezithameli:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Ukukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe okunamapulatifomu amaningi (i-LinkedIn, i-Twitter, i-Facebook, i-Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Amathoni okubhala angenziwa ngezifiso (Ochwepheshe, Okuvamile, Okukhuthazayo)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Ukukhiqizwa kwezithombe ze-AI okuhambisana nokuthunyelwe kwakho
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Qinisekisa ukuthi okuqukethwe kwakho kuhlangabezana nazo zonke izidingo ngaphambi kokushicilela:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Ukuhlola ukuhambisana okuzenzakalelayo ngokumelene nezinqubomgomo zenkampani
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Ukuthola amaphuzu okuzwela amasiko ezithameli zomhlaba wonke
keyFeatures.tip: Sebenzisa amaphrofayili amaqhinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi igama lomkhiqizo lihambisana kahle kukho konke okuqukethwe okukhiqizwe.

bestPractices.intro: Ukulandela le mikhuba emihle kuzokusiza ukuthi uthole okuningi ku-Contentry futhi udale okuqukethwe okusebenza kahle:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Ukuhamba komsebenzi okuqhubekayo kuqinisekisa ikhwalithi nokusebenza kahle:
bestPractices.workflow1: Qala ngokusetha iphrofayela yakho yamasu ngeziqondiso zomkhiqizo
bestPractices.workflow2: Dala okuqukethwe ucabanga ngeplatifomu ethile kanye nezithameli
bestPractices.workflow3: Hlaziya njalo okuqukethwe ngaphambi kokukushicilela kumapulatifomu angaphandle
bestPractices.workflow4: Sebenzisa izici zokuhlela ukuze ugcine i-cadence yokuthumela ehambisanayo
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Ukwakha uphawu oluqhubekayo kwakha ukwethembana nokuqashelwa:
bestPractices.consistency1: Layisha umhlahlandlela wesitayela somkhiqizo wakho ku-Knowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Sebenzisa iphrofayela efanayo yesu emikhankasweni ehlobene
bestPractices.consistency3: Buyekeza okuqukethwe okukhiqizwe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kufana nezwi lakho
bestPractices.warning: Buyekeza njalo okuqukethwe okukhiqizwe yi-AI ngaphambi kokushicilela. Nakuba i-AI yethu inamandla, ukuqondiswa kwabantu kuqinisekisa imiphumela emihle kakhulu.

optimizeContent.intro: Ukudala okuqukethwe okuhle kumane kuyisiqalo. Nansi indlela yokwenza ngcono ukuze uhlanganyele kakhulu:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Ipulatifomu ngayinye inezidingo ezihlukile kanye nokulindelwe yizilaleli:
optimizeContent.platform1: I-LinkedIn: Gxila ekuqondeni kobungcweti, sebenzisa amagama angukhiye embonini, isikhathi eside samukelekile
optimizeContent.platform2: I-Twitter/X: Imiyalezo emfushane, sebenzisa ama-hashtag ngendlela efanele, xhumana nezihloko ezithrendayo
optimizeContent.platform3: I-Facebook: Okuqukethwe okubonakalayo kusebenza kahle, kukhuthaza ukuzibandakanya komphakathi
optimizeContent.platform4: I-Instagram: Izithombe ezisezingeni eliphezulu zibalulekile, sebenzisa ama-hashtag afanele, Izindaba zokuzibandakanya
optimizeContent.engagement1: Thumela njalo ngezikhathi ezifanele kakhulu zezithameli zakho
optimizeContent.engagement2: Sebenzisa ukubiza okuphoqelelayo esenzweni kokuqukethwe kwakho
optimizeContent.engagement3: Phendula kumazwana bese uxhumana nomphakathi wakho
optimizeContent.engagement4: Landelela ukuhlaziya ukuze uqonde ukuthi yikuphi okuqukethwe okusebenza kahle kakhulu
optimizeContent.tip: Sebenzisa isici sokuhlela se-Contentry ukuze uthumele ngezikhathi ezifanele ngaphandle komzamo owenziwa ngesandla.

brandDeals.intro: Ukubambisana komkhiqizo kungaba umthombo omkhulu wemali engenayo. Nansi indlela yokwenza ngcono indlela yakho yokwenza izinto:
brandDeals.prep2: Landelela futhi ubonise izibalo zakho zokuzibandakanya
brandDeals.prep3: Yakha ikhithi yemidiya ngemininingwane yakho kanye nokufinyelela
brandDeals.prep4: Sebenzisa i-Contentry ukudala imiqondo yokuqukethwe eyisampula enophawu
brandDeals.pitch1: Qondanisa inkulumo yakho namanani omkhiqizo kanye nezilaleli eziqondiwe
brandDeals.pitch2: Nikeza imibono ethile yokuqukethwe kuneziphakamiso ezijwayelekile
brandDeals.pitch3: Faka ukuhlaziywa kokuthobela imithetho ukuze ubonise ukuthi okuqukethwe kwakho kuhlangabezana neziqondiso
brandDeals.tip: Sebenzisa ukuhlolwa kokuthobela imithetho kwe-Contentry lapho udala okuqukethwe okuxhasiwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izidingo ze-FTC kanye nokudalulwa kwepulatifomu ziyahlangatshezwa.

influencerProfiles.intro: Iphrofayela yakho Yamasu iyisisekelo sesu lakho lokuqukethwe. Nansi indlela yokulithuthukisa:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Iphrofayela elungiselelwe kahle iqinisekisa okuqukethwe okuhlala njalo, okusebhrendini:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Chaza kahle i-niche yakho kanye nezithameli zakho eziqondiwe
influencerProfiles.setup2: Setha ithoni nesitayela sakho sokubhala osithandayo
influencerProfiles.setup3: Engeza izinto ezicatshangelwayo ngamasiko nezesifunda zezilaleli zakho
influencerProfiles.setup4: Layisha amadokhumenti okubhekisela achaza igama lomkhiqizo wakho
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Thuthukisa iphrofayela yakho njalo ukuze uthole imiphumela engcono:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Buyekeza okuqukethwe okukhiqizwe bese ulungisa izilungiselelo zephrofayela njengoba kudingeka
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Dala amaphrofayela amaningi emikhankaso noma izithameli ezahlukene
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Gcina isisekelo sakho solwazi sivuselelwe ngeziqondiso zakamuva zomkhiqizo
influencerProfiles.tip: Buyekeza iphrofayili yakho yamasu njalo ngekota ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibonakalisa umkhiqizo wakho oguqukayo kanye nezithameli zakho.

workflowsGuide.title: Umhlahlandlela Wokusebenza Nokuthola Amagoli
workflowsGuide.description: Funda ukuthi uhlelo lokufaka amaphuzu lusebenza kanjani futhi uqonde isinyathelo ngasinye somsebenzi kusukela ekuhlaziyweni kokuqukethwe kuya ekuvunyweni.

scoring.intro: Uhlelo lokuthola amaphuzu ku-Contentry lunikeza amaphuzu acacile, asekelwe esijezisweni ukuze kukusize uqonde ukuthi okuqukethwe kwakho kusebenza kanjani. Wonke amaphuzu aqala ku-100 futhi amaphuzu ayasuswa ngenxa yokwephulwa okuthile noma izinkinga ezitholakele.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Isilinganiso sisonke siyinhlanganisela enesisindo yazo zonke izici zokuhlaziya, kusukela ku-0 kuya ku-100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Kuhle kakhulu - Kulungele ukushicilelwa, okuqukethwe kulungiselelwe kahle kakhulu
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Kuhle - Kunconywa intuthuko encane ngaphambi kokushicilela
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Kuhlatshwe umkhosi - Izinkinga ezibalulekile, ungashicileli kuze kube yilapho zixazululiwe
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Iphuzu lilonke lisebenzisa isisindo esiguquguqukayo ngokusekelwe ezingeni lobungozi:
scoring.overallCalc4: Ingozi Ebucayi (Ukuthobela imithetho 40): Isilinganiso esiphelele sinomkhawulo oqinile ku-40 esiphezulu
scoring.componentsDesc: Isikolo sakho sisonke sibalwa kusukela ezingxenyeni ezintathu ezibalulekile kusetshenziswa uhlelo olusekelwe esijezisweni:
scoring.component1: Isilinganiso Sokuthobela Umthetho: Siqala ku-100, sisusa amaphuzu ngokwephulwa ngakunye okutholiwe
scoring.component2: Isilinganiso Sokuzwela Kwamasiko: Isilinganiso sezilinganiso eziyisithupha zamasiko zikaHofstede
scoring.component3: Isilinganiso Sokunemba: Siqala ku-100, sisusa amaphuzu ngokunganembi ngakunye noma inkinga ngayinye etholakele
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Iposi ngalinye liqala nge-Compliance Score engu-100. Amaphuzu ayasuswa ngokwephulwa ngakunye:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Ukwephulwa Okubucayi (-amaphuzu angu-60): Ukwephulwa kwe-NDA, ukudalulwa kolwazi oluyimfihlo  Ingozi yokuqedwa ngokushesha
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Ukwephulwa Okukhulu (-40 amaphuzu): Ukuhlukumeza, ukucwasa, inkulumo enenzondo  Ingozi yesenzo sezomthetho
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Ukwephulwa Okuphezulu (-25 amaphuzu): Ukudalulwa kokukhangisa okungekho, ukwephulwa kwenqubomgomo  Inhlawulo/ingozi yokumiswa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Ukwephulwa Okumaphakathi (-10 amaphuzu): Ithoni engafanele, ukuphambuka okuncane kwesiqondiso  Ukuqeqeshwa/isixwayiso
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Isibonelo: Akukho #ad (-25) + Inkinga yethoni (-10) = Isilinganiso sokugcina esingu-65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Inqwaba yokwephulwa kwemithetho eminingi - isijeziso ngasinye sisetshenziswa ngokuhlangene
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ukwephulwa okuhloliwe: Ulwazi oluyimfihlo, Ukuhlukumeza, ukwephulwa kwe-NDA, Ukudalulwa okungekho, Ukwephulwa kwenqubomgomo, Ithoni engafanele
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Amaphuzu amasiko ayisilinganiso sezilinganiso eziyisithupha ezisemthethweni zamasiko e-Hofstede (0-100 ngayinye):
scoring.culturalDim1: Ibanga Lamandla: Ukufaneleka, inhlonipho yegunya vs. ukulingana, ithoni ekhululekile
scoring.culturalDim2: Ukuzimela komuntu ngamunye vs. Ukuqoqana: Ukugxila 'Mina/Mina' vs. Ukugxila 'Thina/Nathi' emphakathini
scoring.culturalDim3: Ubudoda vs. Ubufazi: Ulimi lokuncintisana/lokuzigqaja vs. lokubambisana/lokuvumelana
scoring.culturalDim4: Ukugwema Ukungaqiniseki: Imithetho, ukuphepha, ukugcizelela ukucaca vs. ukuvuleleka ekungacacini
scoring.culturalDim5: Ukujwayela Isikhathi Eside: Ukugxila kwemivuzo yesikhathi esizayo uma kuqhathaniswa nezinzuzo zesikhashana
scoring.culturalDim6: Ukuzitika vs. Ukuzibamba: Ukuba nethemba/ukuzijabulisa vs. ulimi olugodliwe/olulawulwayo
scoring.culturalRisk: Uma i-Cultural Score yehla ngaphansi kwama-50, kusetshenziswa isisindo 'se-Reputation Risk' ukuvikela umkhiqizo wakho kuzo zonke izithameli zomhlaba.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Konke okuthunyelwe kuqala nge-Accuracy Score engu-100. Amaphuzu ayasuswa ngezinkinga ezitholakele:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Ukungalungi Okukhulu/Ulwazi Olungalungile (-40 amaphuzu): Izimangalo ezingamanga, idatha eqanjiwe
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Umthombo Ongathembekile (-20 amaphuzu): Izimangalo ezivela emithonjeni engathembekile
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Isimangalo Esingenakuqinisekiswa (-10 amaphuzu): Izitatimende ezingenakuhlolwa amaqiniso
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Isibonelo: Isimangalo esingamanga (-40) + Umthombo ongaqinisekisiwe (-20) = Isilinganiso sokugcina esingu-40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Inqwaba yezinkinga eziningi - inhlawulo ngayinye isetshenziswa ngokuqongelela
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Okuqukethwe kumakwa ngokuzenzakalelayo ngokusekelwe emiphumeleni yokuhlaziya:
scoring.flag1: Ukusabalala Okuhle (Okuluhlaza): Amaphuzu angaphezu kuka-80 - alungele ukushicilelwa
scoring.flag2: Kudingeka Ukunakwa (Okuphuzi): Amaphuzu angu-60-79 - kunconywa ukuthuthukiswa okuncane
scoring.flag3: Kuhlatshwe umkhosi ukuze kubuyekezwe (Orange): Amaphuzu angu-40-59 - kudingeka isibuyekezo ngaphambi kokushicilela
scoring.flag4: Izinkinga Ezibucayi (Ezibomvu): Amaphuzu angaphansi kuka-40 - ungashicileli kuze kube yilapho kuxazululiwe
scoring.disclosure1: Kuyiphromoshini: Kuthola ukuthi okuqukethwe kuyakhangisa noma kuyaxhasiwe
scoring.disclosure2: Inokudalulwa: Ukuhlola #ukudalulwa kwesikhangiso, #okuxhasiwe, noma kobambiswano olufanele
scoring.disclosure3: Ukuthobela Imithetho Yesifunda: Kuqinisekisa izidingo zokudalulwa kwe-FTC (US), EU, kanye neNorway
scoring.disclosure4: Ukudalulwa okungekho kubangela ukwephulwa okuphezulu (amaphuzu angu-25) ku-Compliance Score
scoring.tip: Amaphuzu abalwa kabusha isikhathi ngasinye lapho okuqukethwe kuhlaziywa. Sebenzisa isici sokubhala kabusha ukuze uthuthukise ngokuzenzakalelayo okuqukethwe okunamagoli aphansi ngenkathi ugcina umlayezo wakho.

analyze.intro: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Analyze Content lukusiza ukuthi uhlole okuqukethwe okukhona ukuze uthole ukuhambisana, ukuzwela kwamasiko, kanye nekhwalithi ngaphambi kokushicilela.
analyze.stepsDesc: Landela lezi zinyathelo ukuze uhlaziye okuqukethwe kwakho:
analyze.step1: Zulazulela ku-Content Intelligence > Hlaziya ithebhu yokuqukethwe
analyze.step2: Namathisela noma thayipha okuqukethwe kwakho endaweni yombhalo
analyze.step3: Khetha iphrofayela yesu ukuze usebenzise iziqondiso zomkhiqizo wakho
analyze.step4: Khetha ngokuzithandela 'Khiqiza isithombe esihambisanayo' uma ufuna i-AI idale isithombe esibonakalayo
analyze.step5: Chofoza okuthi 'Hlaziya' ukuze usebenzise ukuhlaziya okugcwele
analyze.type1: Ukuhlola Ukuthobela Imithetho: Kuqinisekisa okuqukethwe ngokumelene nezinqubomgomo nemithethonqubo yesikhulumi (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Ukuzwela Kwamasiko: Kuskena okuqukethwe okungase kube okucasulayo noma okungazweli ngamasiko
analyze.type3: Ukuqinisekiswa Kokunemba: Kuhlola izimangalo namaqiniso ukuze kutholakale ukunemba
analyze.type4: Ukulungiswa Komkhiqizo: Kuqhathanisa okuqukethwe neziqondiso zakho zephrofayela yamasu
analyze.tip: Sebenzisa inkinobho ethi 'Bhala Kabusha' ukuze uthuthukise ngokuzenzakalelayo okuqukethwe okunama-score angaphansi kuka-70. I-AI izobhekana nezinkinga ezimakiwe ngenkathi igcina umlayezo wakho.

generate.intro: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Generate Content lusebenzisa i-AI ukudala okuqukethwe okusha ngokusekelwe esihlokweni sakho, izidingo zepulatifomu, kanye neziqondiso zomkhiqizo.
generate.step1: Zulazulela ku-Content Intelligence > ithebhu yokukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe
generate.step2: Faka isihloko sakho noma uchaze ukuthi yini ofuna ukuyidala
generate.step3: Khetha ipulatifomu(amapulatifomu) oqondiwe kanye nethoni yokubhala
generate.step4: Khetha iphrofayili yesu ukuze kube nokuvumelana komkhiqizo
generate.step5: Chofoza okuthi 'Khiqiza' ukuze udale okuqukethwe okusekelwe ku-AI
generate.optionsDesc: Yenza ngokwezifiso okuqukethwe kwakho okukhiqizwe ngalezi zinketho:
generate.option1: Ukukhetha Ipulatifomu: Khetha ipulatifomu eyodwa noma eziningi (i-LinkedIn, i-Twitter, i-Facebook, i-Instagram)
generate.option2: Ithoni Yokubhala: Khetha kusuka ku-Professional, Casual, Inspirational, noma Informative
generate.option3: Ubude Bokuqukethwe: Lungisa ubude obuqondiwe bokuqukethwe kwakho
generate.option4: Ukukhiqizwa Kwezithombe: Vula ukuze udale isithombe esihambisanayo esenziwe nge-AI
generate.tip: Okuqukethwe okukhiqiziwe kuhlaziywa ngokuzenzakalelayo ngemva kokudalwa. Buyekeza amaphuzu bese usebenzisa izinkinobho zempendulo ukuze uphinde ukhiqize uma kudingeka.

schedulePrompt.intro: I-Schedule Prompt ikuvumela ukuthi usethe ukukhiqizwa kokuqukethwe okuzenzakalelayo okusebenza ngezikhathi ezithile, ugcine ikhalenda lakho lokuqukethwe ligcwele ngaphandle kokungenelela ngesandla.
schedulePrompt.step1: Dala isikhuthazo sakho sokukhiqiza okuqukethwe ngesihloko kanye nezintandokazi
schedulePrompt.step2: Setha imvamisa yesimiso (nsuku zonke, masonto onke, noma izinsuku ezithile)
schedulePrompt.step3: Khetha isikhathi lapho okuqukethwe kufanele kukhiqizwe khona
schedulePrompt.step4: Nika amandla i-'Hlaziya ngokuzenzakalela' ukuze kuqaliswe ukuhlaziywa kokuqukethwe okukhiqizwe ngokuzenzakalelayo
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Gcina ukuthumela okuqhubekayo ngaphandle komsebenzi wezandla wansuku zonke
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Khiqiza okuqukethwe ngesikhathi samahora amahle kakhulu okudala
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Yakha i-backlog yokuqukethwe ukuze ibuyekezwe futhi ivunywe
schedulePrompt.tip: Imiyalelo ehleliwe ikhiqiza okuqukethwe kokusalungiswa kwakho. Buyekeza futhi uvume ngaphambi kokushicilela ukuqinisekisa ikhwalithi.

schedulePost.intro: Ukuhlela Okuthunyelwe kukuvumela ukuthi uhlele okuqukethwe okuvunyiwe ukuze kushicilelwe ngokuzenzakalela ngezikhathi ezifanele kuzo zonke izinkundla zakho zokuxhumana ezixhunyiwe.
schedulePost.step1: Kusukela kunoma yikuphi ukubuka kokuqukethwe, chofoza okuthi 'Shejula' esikhundleni sokuthi 'Shicilela Manje'
schedulePost.step2: Khetha usuku nesikhathi ohlose ukushicilelwa ngaso
schedulePost.step3: Khetha ukuthi yiziphi izinkundla zokuxhumana ezixhunyiwe ozoshicilela kuzo
schedulePost.step4: Qinisekisa bese ufaka emgqeni wakho ohleliwe
schedulePost.option1: Isikhathi Esiqondile: Khetha usuku nesikhathi esiqondile sokushicilela
schedulePost.option2: Isikhathi Esingcono Kakhulu: Vumela i-AI iphakamise izikhathi ezifanele zokuthumela ngokusekelwe kudatha yokuzibandakanya
schedulePost.option3: Ipulatifomu Eningi: Hlela okuqukethwe okufanayo kumapulatifomu amaningi ngesikhathi esisodwa
schedulePost.warning: Okuthunyelwe okuhleliwe kudinga okungenani i-akhawunti eyodwa yezokuxhumana exhunyiwe. Xhuma ama-akhawunti kuzilungiselelo > Amaphrofayela Omphakathi.

approval.intro: Uhlelo Lokusebenza Lokugunyaza luqinisekisa ikhwalithi yokuqukethwe ngokudinga ukubuyekezwa komphathi ngaphambi kokushicilela. Lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu kumaqembu ebhizinisi kanye nezimboni ezilawulwayo.
approval.processDesc: Indlela okuqukethwe okudlula ngayo ohlelweni lokusebenza lokugunyaza:
approval.step1: Umdali uthumela okuqukethwe ngokuchofoza okuthi 'Thumela ukuze Kuvunywe'
approval.step3: Umphathi ubuyekeza okuqukethwe, amaphuzu, kanye nemiphumela yokuhlaziya
approval.step4: Umphathi uyavuma, ucela izinguquko, noma wenqaba okuqukethwe
approval.status2: Kusalinde Ukuvunyelwa: Kuthunyelwe futhi kulinde ukubuyekezwa komphathi
approval.status4: Izidingo Zokubuyekezwa: Umphathi ucele izinguquko - hlola impendulo bese uthumela kabusha
approval.tip: Engeza amanothi lapho uthumela okuqukethwe ukuze unike ababuyekezi umongo mayelana nezinqumo zakho zokudala. Lokhu kusheshisa inqubo yokugunyazwa.

confirmDelete.title: Qinisekisa Ukususa
confirmDelete.userMessage: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lo msebenzisi? Lesi senzo asikwazi ukuhlehliswa.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa abasebenzisi abangu-{{count}}? Lesi senzo asikwazi ukuhlehliswa.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Khansela Okubhaliselwe
confirmCancelSubscription.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukukhansela okubhalisele kwalo msebenzisi? Bazolahlekelwa ukufinyelela kuzici zeprimiyamu.

twoFactorAuth.title: Ukuqinisekiswa Kwezici Ezimbili
twoFactorAuth.description: Engeza isendlalelo esengeziwe sokuphepha ku-akhawunti yakho
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Skena le khodi ye-QR ngohlelo lwakho lokusebenza lokufakazela ubuqiniso
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Londoloza la makhodi endaweni ephephile. Ungawasebenzisa ukufinyelela i-akhawunti yakho uma ulahlekelwa yi-authenticator yakho.

postsTable.title: Konke Okuthunyelwe
postsTable.description: Phatha futhi ubuyekeze konke okuthunyelwe kwakho

emptyState.createFirst: Dala okuthunyelwe kwakho kokuqala ukuze uqalise

gdpr.cookieDescription: Sisebenzisa amakhukhi ukuthuthukisa ulwazi lwakho lokuphequlula, ukukhonza okuqukethwe okwenziwe ngokwezifiso, nokuhlaziya ithrafikhi yethu. Ngokuchofoza okuthi "Yamukela Konke", uyavuma ukusetshenziswa kwethu kwamakhukhi. Ungenza ngokwezifiso izintandokazi zakho noma wenqabe amakhukhi angabalulekile.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Kuyadingeka ekuqinisekisweni, ukuphepha, kanye nokusebenza okuyisisekelo. Akukwazi ukukhutshazwa.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Sisize siqonde ukuthi izivakashi zixhumana kanjani nepulatifomu yethu ukuze zithuthukise izinsizakalo zethu.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Kusetshenziselwa ukuletha izikhangiso ezenzelwe wena kanye nokukala ukusebenza kahle komkhankaso.
